string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Turn off all the fans and bulbs while going out.
Save electricity Save Earth.
Keep future Bright, Turn of Light.
Today\'s wastage is tomorrow\'s shortage.
Go Green! Save mother Earth
Check appliances condition daily.
‘Let there be light’ – for our grandchildren
Don’t be a thug, pull the plug
Be a bright spark, lights off till its dark!
If you don’t wanna pay it save it
Give the earth a hug, pull the plug.
Saving Electricty is a BRIGHT idea!
You Have the Power to Conserve.
Kill the light to win the fight
